name: hammer_space
description:
It's 1997. You gain access to a leaked build of an in-development first person shooter game.

Controls:

WASD — Move
SPACE — Jump, double jump
LMB — Use weapon

Team:

Dito Seregin https://twitter.com/terzalo
Nick Shikhachevskiy: https://www.instagram.com/lqfp_post/
Yuriy Makeev: https://www.instagram.com/drmckey
Viktor Parfenov: https://www.instagram.com/parfenov.viktor

Third-party attributions are listed on game's credits page.
